meanings.definition: Having or showing quick and inventive verbal humor.
meanings.sent1: She is the wittiest person in our group, always making us laugh with her clever jokes.
meanings.sent2: The comedian delivered the wittiest punchline of the night, leaving the audience in stitches.
meanings.sent3: Even in serious situations, he manages to insert the wittiest remarks to lighten the mood.
meanings.sent4: Her wittiest comments cut through the tension like a sharp knife, bringing smiles to everyone's faces.
meanings.sent5: His wittiest anecdotes are like sparkling gems that brighten up any conversation.

meanings.definition: Possessing or displaying wit or humor.
meanings.sent1: Out of all her friends, Sarah is the wittiest, always coming up with funny jokes to share.
meanings.sent2: The wittiest students in the class often make the lessons more enjoyable with their humor.
meanings.sent3: His wittiest moments are when he combines humor with unexpected insights, making everyone chuckle.
meanings.sent4: The wittiest remarks can sometimes reveal deeper truths in a lighthearted way.
meanings.sent5: The wittiest individuals have a special talent for turning everyday situations into comedic gold.
